LanguageGHC2024

HGeometry

Contents

  • Primitive Geometric Data Types

Description

Main starting point for HGeometry

Synopsis
  • diskFromPoints :: (Point_ point 2 r, Ord r, Num r) => point -> point -> point -> Maybe (BallByPoints point)
  • _BallSphere :: forall point point' p f. (Profunctor p, Functor f) => p (Sphere point) (f (Sphere point')) -> p (Ball point) (f (Ball point'))
  • _DiskCircle :: forall point point' p f. (Profunctor p, Functor f) => p (Circle point) (f (Circle point')) -> p (Disk point) (f (Disk point'))
  • fromBoundaryPoints :: (Point_ point 2 r, Fractional r, Ord r) => Vector 3 point -> Maybe (Disk (Point 2 r))
  • fromCenterAndPoint :: forall r point (d :: Nat) center. (Num r, Point_ point d r, Point_ center d r, Has_ Metric_ d r) => center -> point -> Ball center
  • fromDiametralPair :: forall r point (d :: Nat). (Fractional r, Point_ point d r, Has_ Metric_ d r) => point -> point -> Ball (Point d r)
  • squaredRadius' :: forall point f. Functor f => (NumType point -> f (NumType point)) -> Ball point -> f (Ball point)
  • pattern Ball_ :: ConstructableBall_ ball point => point -> NumType ball -> ball
  • pattern Disk_ :: (Disk_ ball point, ConstructableBall_ ball point) => point -> NumType ball -> ball
  • inDisk :: (Point_ point 2 r, HasInBall disk, Ord r, Num r, Dimension disk ~ 2, NumType disk ~ r) => point -> disk -> PointLocationResult
  • radius :: (Radical r, Ball_ ball point, NumType ball ~ r) => ball -> r
  • boundingHyperPlaneLens :: forall boundingHyperPlane boundingHyperPlane' f. Functor f => (boundingHyperPlane -> f boundingHyperPlane') -> HalfSpaceF boundingHyperPlane -> f (HalfSpaceF boundingHyperPlane')
  • pattern Plane_ :: Plane_ plane r => r -> r -> r -> plane
  • isParallelTo :: forall hyperPlane (d :: Natural) r hyperPlane'. (HyperPlane_ hyperPlane d r, HyperPlane_ hyperPlane' d r, Has_ Metric_ d r, Num r, Eq r, 1 <= d) => hyperPlane -> hyperPlane' -> Bool
  • pointOn :: forall hyperPlane (d :: Natural) r. (HyperPlane_ hyperPlane d r, Eq r, Fractional r, Has_ Additive_ d r, FoldableWithIndex Int (Vector d)) => hyperPlane -> Point d r
  • showPlaneEquation :: (Plane_ plane r, Show r) => plane -> String
  • cmpInDirection :: forall point (d :: Natural) r. (Ord r, Num r, Has_ Metric_ (d + 1) r, Has_ Metric_ d r, Point_ point d r, d < (d + 1)) => Vector d r -> point -> point -> Ordering
  • asNonVerticalHyperPlane :: forall hyperPlane (d :: Natural) r. (HyperPlane_ hyperPlane d r, Fractional r, Eq r, 1 <= d) => hyperPlane -> Maybe (NonVerticalHyperPlane d r)
  • fromLineEQ :: Num r => LineEQ r -> LinePV 2 r
  • horizontalLine :: forall r line. (Line_ line 2 r, Num r) => r -> line
  • lineThrough :: forall line point (d :: Nat) r. (Line_ line d r, Point_ point d r, Num r) => point -> point -> line
  • verticalLine :: forall r line. (Line_ line 2 r, Num r) => r -> line
  • evalAt' :: Num r => r -> LineEQ r -> r
  • pattern NVLine2_ :: NonVerticalHyperPlane_ line 2 r => r -> r -> line
  • intercept :: NonVerticalHyperPlane_ line 2 r => Lens' line r
  • slope :: NonVerticalHyperPlane_ line 2 r => Lens' line r
  • anchorPoint :: forall (d :: Nat) r f. Functor f => (Point d r -> f (Point d r)) -> LinePV d r -> f (LinePV d r)
  • bisector :: (Fractional r, Point_ point 2 r) => point -> point -> LinePV 2 r
  • cmpSlope :: (Num r, Ord r) => LinePV 2 r -> LinePV 2 r -> Ordering
  • fromLinearFunction :: Num r => r -> r -> LinePV 2 r
  • isIdenticalTo :: forall (d :: Nat) r. Eq (Vector d r) => LinePV d r -> LinePV d r -> Bool
  • isPerpendicularTo :: (Num r, Eq r) => Vector 2 r -> LinePV 2 r -> Bool
  • leftHalfPlane :: (Num r, Ord r) => LinePV 2 r -> HalfSpaceF (LinePV 2 r)
  • liesAbove :: (Ord r, Num r, Point_ point 2 r) => point -> LinePV 2 r -> Bool
  • liesBelow :: (Ord r, Num r, Point_ point 2 r) => point -> LinePV 2 r -> Bool
  • onSide :: (Ord r, Num r, Point_ point 2 r) => point -> LinePV 2 r -> SideTest
  • perpendicularTo :: Num r => LinePV 2 r -> LinePV 2 r
  • rightHalfPlane :: (Num r, Ord r) => LinePV 2 r -> HalfSpaceF (LinePV 2 r)
  • toLinearFunction :: (Fractional r, Ord r) => LinePV 2 r -> Maybe (LineEQ r)
  • pattern LineSegment_ :: LineSegment_ lineSegment point => point -> point -> lineSegment

  • ordAtX :: (Num r, Ord r, LineSegment_ lineSegment point, Point_ point 2 r) => r -> lineSegment -> lineSegment -> Ordering
  • ordAtY :: (Num r, Ord r, LineSegment_ lineSegment point, Point_ point 2 r) => r -> lineSegment -> lineSegment -> Ordering

  • orientLR :: forall lineSegment point (d :: Nat) r. (LineSegment_ lineSegment point, Point_ point d r, 1 <= d, Ord r) => lineSegment -> lineSegment

  • yCoordAt :: (Fractional r, Ord r, LineSegment_ lineSegment point, Point_ point 2 r) => r -> lineSegment -> r

  • projectPoint :: forall (i :: Nat) point (d :: Nat) r. (Point_ point d r, i <= d, Has_ Vector_ i r) => point -> Point i r
  • pattern Point1_ :: Point_ point 1 r => r -> point
  • pattern Point2_ :: Point_ point 2 r => r -> r -> point
  • pattern Point3_ :: Point_ point 3 r => r -> r -> r -> point
  • pattern Point4_ :: Point_ point 4 r => r -> r -> r -> r -> point

  • origin :: forall point (d :: Nat) r. (Num r, ConstructablePoint_ point d r) => point

  • xCoord :: forall (d :: Natural) point r. (1 <= d, Point_ point d r) => IndexedLens' Int point r
  • yCoord :: forall (d :: Natural) point r. (2 <= d, Point_ point d r) => IndexedLens' Int point r
  • zCoord :: forall (d :: Natural) point r. (3 <= d, Point_ point d r) => IndexedLens' Int point r

  • squaredEuclideanDist :: forall r point (d :: Nat) point'. (Num r, Point_ point d r, Point_ point' d r, Metric_ (Vector d r) d r) => point -> point' -> r

  • cwCmpAround :: (Point_ center 2 r, Point_ point 2 r, Ord r, Num r) => center -> point -> point -> Ordering
  • cwCmpAroundWith :: (Point_ center 2 r, Point_ point 2 r, Ord r, Num r) => Vector 2 r -> center -> point -> point -> Ordering
  • insertIntoCyclicOrder :: (Point_ center 2 r, Point_ point 2 r, Ord r, Num r) => center -> point -> CList point -> CList point
  • isCoLinear :: (Point_ point 2 r, Num r, Eq r) => point -> point -> point -> Bool
  • sortAround :: (Point_ center 2 r, Point_ point 2 r, Num r, Ord r) => center -> [point] -> [point]
  • partitionIntoQuadrants :: (Ord r, Point_ point 2 r) => point -> [point] -> ([point], [point], [point], [point])
  • quadrant :: (Ord r, Num r, ConstructablePoint_ point 2 r) => point -> Quadrant
  • quadrantWith :: (Ord r, Point_ point 2 r) => point -> point -> Quadrant
  • isScalarMultipleOf :: forall r vector (d :: Nat). (Eq r, Num r, Metric_ vector d r) => vector -> vector -> Bool
  • sameDirection :: forall vector (d :: Nat) r. (Additive_ vector d r, Num r, Eq r) => vector -> vector -> Bool
  • scalarMultiple :: forall r vector (d :: Nat). (Eq r, Fractional r, Additive_ vector d r) => vector -> vector -> Maybe r
  • (*^) :: forall r vector (d :: Nat). (Num r, Vector_ vector d r) => r -> vector -> vector
  • (^*) :: forall r vector (d :: Nat). (Num r, Vector_ vector d r) => vector -> r -> vector
  • (^+^) :: forall r vector (d :: Nat). (Num r, Additive_ vector d r) => vector -> vector -> vector
  • (^-^) :: forall r vector (d :: Nat). (Num r, Additive_ vector d r) => vector -> vector -> vector
  • (^/) :: forall vector (d :: Nat) r. (Vector_ vector d r, Fractional r) => vector -> r -> vector
  • basis :: forall vector (d :: Nat) r. (Additive_ vector d r, Num r) => [vector]
  • component :: forall (i :: Natural) vector r (d :: Natural). (i <= (d - 1), KnownNat i, Vector_ vector d r) => IndexedLens' Int vector r
  • cons :: forall vector' vector (d :: Nat) r. (Vector_ vector d r, Vector_ vector' (d + 1) r) => r -> vector -> vector'
  • foldMapZip :: forall vector (d :: Nat) r m. (Additive_ vector d r, Semigroup m) => (r -> r -> m) -> vector -> vector -> m
  • generate :: forall vector (d :: Nat) r. Vector_ vector d r => (Int -> r) -> vector
  • lerp :: forall r vector (d :: Nat). (Num r, Additive_ vector d r) => r -> vector -> vector -> vector
  • liftI2 :: forall vector (d :: Nat) r. Additive_ vector d r => (r -> r -> r) -> vector -> vector -> vector
  • negated :: forall r vector (d :: Nat). (Num r, Vector_ vector d r) => vector -> vector
  • prefix :: forall (i :: Nat) (d :: Nat) vector vector' r. (i <= d, Vector_ vector d r, Vector_ vector' i r) => vector -> vector'
  • snoc :: forall vector' vector (d :: Nat) r. (Vector_ vector d r, Vector_ vector' (d + 1) r) => vector -> r -> vector'
  • suffix :: forall (i :: Nat) (d :: Nat) vector vector' r. (i <= d, Vector_ vector d r, Vector_ vector' i r) => vector -> vector'
  • sumV :: forall f vector (d :: Nat) r. (Foldable f, Additive_ vector d r, Num r) => f vector -> vector
  • uncons :: forall vector' vector (d :: Natural) r. (Vector_ vector (d + 1) r, Vector_ vector' d r, 0 <= ((d + 1) - 1), d <= Dimension vector) => vector -> (r, vector')
  • unit :: forall vector (d :: Nat) r. (Additive_ vector d r, Num r) => vector
  • unsnoc :: forall vector' vector (d :: Natural) r. (Vector_ vector (d + 1) r, Vector_ vector' d r, d <= ((d + 1) - 1), d <= Dimension vector) => vector -> (vector', r)
  • vectorFromList :: forall vector (d :: Nat) r. Vector_ vector d r => [r] -> Maybe vector
  • wComponent :: forall vector (d :: Nat) r. (Vector_ vector d r, 4 <= d) => IndexedLens' Int vector r
  • xComponent :: forall vector (d :: Nat) r. (Vector_ vector d r, 1 <= d) => IndexedLens' Int vector r
  • yComponent :: forall vector (d :: Nat) r. (Vector_ vector d r, 2 <= d) => IndexedLens' Int vector r
  • zComponent :: forall vector (d :: Nat) r. (Vector_ vector d r, 3 <= d) => IndexedLens' Int vector r
  • zero :: forall r vector (d :: Nat). (Num r, Additive_ vector d r) => vector
  • cross :: Num r => Vector 3 r -> Vector 3 r -> Vector 3 r
  • type BallByPoints point = BallByPoints' (1 + Dimension point) point
  • newtype BallByPoints' (k :: Nat) point = BoundaryPoints (Vector k point)
  • data Ball point where
    • Ball !point !(NumType point)
    • pattern Disk :: point -> NumType point -> Disk point
  • type Circle = Sphere
  • type Disk = Ball
  • newtype Sphere point where
    • MkSphere (Ball point)
    • pattern Circle :: point -> NumType point -> Circle point
    • pattern Sphere :: point -> NumType point -> Sphere point
  • class (HasCenter ball point, NumType ball ~ NumType point, Point_ point (Dimension ball) (NumType ball)) => Ball_ ball point | ball -> point where
    • squaredRadius :: Getter ball (NumType ball)
  • class Ball_ ball point => ConstructableBall_ ball point where
    • fromCenterAndSquaredRadius :: point -> NumType ball -> ball
    • unitBall :: forall r (d :: Nat). (r ~ NumType ball, d ~ Dimension ball, Num r, ConstructablePoint_ point d r) => ball
  • class (Ball_ disk point, Dimension disk ~ 2) => Disk_ disk point
  • class HasCenter geom point | geom -> point where
    • center :: Lens' geom point
  • class HasInBall ball where
    • inBall :: forall point (d :: Nat) r. (Point_ point d r, Ord r, Num r, NumType ball ~ r, Dimension ball ~ d) => point -> ball -> PointLocationResult
  • newtype DiametralBall point where
    • MkDiametralBall (Vector 2 point)
    • pattern DiametralPoints :: point -> point -> DiametralBall point
  • class IsBoxable g where
    • boundingBox :: forall (d :: Nat) r. (d ~ Dimension g, r ~ NumType g, Ord r) => g -> Box (Point d r)
  • class (HasMinPoint box point, HasMaxPoint box point, Point_ point (Dimension box) (NumType box)) => Box_ box point | box -> point where
    • extent :: forall r (d :: Nat). (r ~ NumType box, d ~ Dimension box, Num r) => box -> Vector d (ClosedInterval r)
  • data Box point where
    • pattern Box :: point -> point -> Box point
    • pattern Rect :: Num r => r -> r -> r -> r -> Rectangle (Point 2 r)
    • pattern Rectangle :: Dimension point ~ 2 => point -> point -> Box point
  • type family BoundingHyperPlane halfSpace (d :: Nat) r
  • type HalfPlane_ halfPlane r = HalfSpace_ halfPlane 2 r
  • class (Dimension halfSpace ~ d, Dimension (BoundingHyperPlane halfSpace d r) ~ d, NumType halfSpace ~ r, NumType (BoundingHyperPlane halfSpace d r) ~ r) => HalfSpace_ halfSpace (d :: Nat) r | halfSpace -> d, halfSpace -> r where
    • type BoundingHyperPlane halfSpace (d :: Nat) r
    • boundingHyperPlane :: Lens' halfSpace (BoundingHyperPlane halfSpace d r)
    • halfSpaceSign :: Lens' halfSpace Sign
  • type HalfPlaneF line = HalfSpaceF line
  • type HalfSpace (d :: Natural) r = HalfSpaceF (HyperPlane d r)
  • data HalfSpaceF boundingHyperPlane = HalfSpace !Sign boundingHyperPlane
  • data Point_x_HalfSpace_Intersection boundaryPoint interiorPoint
    • = Point_x_HalfSpace_OnBoundary boundaryPoint
    • | Point_x_HalfSpace_Interior interiorPoint
  • class HyperPlane_ hyperPlane d r => ConstructableHyperPlane_ hyperPlane (d :: Natural) r where
    • type HyperPlaneFromEquationConstraint hyperPlane (d :: Natural) r
    • hyperPlaneFromEquation :: Vector (d + 1) r -> hyperPlane
    • fromPointAndNormal :: (Point_ point d r, Num r) => point -> Vector d r -> hyperPlane
  • type family HyperPlaneFromEquationConstraint hyperPlane (d :: Natural) r
  • class HyperPlaneFromPoints hyperPlane where
    • hyperPlaneThrough :: forall point (d :: Nat) r. (Point_ point d r, HyperPlane_ hyperPlane d r, Num r) => Vector d point -> hyperPlane
  • class (NumType hyperPlane ~ r, Dimension hyperPlane ~ d, Has_ Vector_ d r, Has_ Vector_ (1 + d) r) => HyperPlane_ hyperPlane (d :: Natural) r | hyperPlane -> d, hyperPlane -> r where
    • evalHyperPlaneEquation :: (Num r, Point_ point d r) => hyperPlane -> point -> r
    • hyperPlaneEquation :: hyperPlane -> Vector (d + 1) r
    • normalVector :: hyperPlane -> Vector d r
    • onHyperPlane :: (Point_ point d r, Eq r, Num r) => point -> hyperPlane -> Bool
    • onSideTest :: (Point_ point d r, Ord r, Num r) => point -> hyperPlane -> Ordering
  • class HyperPlane_ hyperPlane d r => NonVerticalHyperPlane_ hyperPlane (d :: Natural) r where
    • evalAt :: (Num r, 1 <= d, Point_ point (d - 1) r) => point -> hyperPlane -> r
    • hyperPlaneCoefficients :: Lens' hyperPlane (Vector d r)
    • verticalSideTest :: (1 <= d, Point_ point d r, Ord r, Num r) => point -> hyperPlane -> Ordering
  • type Plane_ plane = NonVerticalHyperPlane_ plane 3
  • newtype HyperPlane (d :: Natural) r where
    • HyperPlane (Vector (d + 1) r)
    • pattern HyperPlane2 :: r -> r -> r -> HyperPlane 2 r
    • pattern HyperPlane3 :: r -> r -> r -> r -> HyperPlane 3 r
  • type MkHyperPlaneConstraints (d :: Natural) r = (d < (d + 1), KnownNat d, Has_ Metric_ d r, Has_ Metric_ (d + 1) r, Has_ Vector_ d r, Has_ Vector_ (d + 1) r)
  • data PlanePlaneIntersection plane line
    • = Plane_x_Plane_Line line
    • | Plane_x_Plane_Plane plane
  • newtype NonVerticalHyperPlane (d :: Nat) r where
    • NonVerticalHyperPlane (Vector d r)
    • pattern Plane :: r -> r -> r -> Plane r
  • type Plane = NonVerticalHyperPlane 3
  • data family IntersectionOf g h
  • type family EndPointOf interval
  • class HasEnd seg p | seg -> p where
    • end :: Lens' seg p
  • class HasEndPoint seg p | seg -> p where
    • endPoint :: Lens' seg p
  • class HasStart seg p | seg -> p where
    • start :: Lens' seg p
  • class HasStartPoint seg p | seg -> p where
    • startPoint :: Lens' seg p
  • type family StartPointOf interval
  • data AnEndPoint r where
    • AnEndPoint !EndPointType !r
    • pattern AnClosedE :: r -> AnEndPoint r
    • pattern AnOpenE :: r -> AnEndPoint r
  • newtype EndPoint (et :: EndPointType) r where
    • EndPoint r
    • pattern ClosedE :: r -> EndPoint 'Closed r
    • pattern OpenE :: r -> EndPoint 'Open r
  • class IsEndPoint endPoint endPoint => EndPoint_ endPoint where
    • endPointType :: endPoint -> EndPointType
    • mkEndPoint :: IxValue endPoint -> endPoint
  • class HasOnLine line (d :: Nat) | line -> d where
    • onLine :: (Point_ point d r, Num r, Eq r, r ~ NumType line, d ~ Dimension line) => point -> line -> Bool
  • type Line2_ line r = (Line_ line 2 r, HyperPlane_ line 2 r)
  • class Line_ line (d :: Nat) r | line -> d, line -> r where
    • fromPointAndVec :: (Point_ point d r, Line_ line d r, Num r) => point -> Vector d r -> line
  • type LineLineIntersection line = LineLineIntersectionG (NumType line) line
  • data LineLineIntersectionG r line
    • = Line_x_Line_Point (Point 2 r)
    • | Line_x_Line_Line line
  • newtype LineEQ r where
    • MkLineEQ (NonVerticalHyperPlane 2 r)
    • pattern LineEQ :: r -> r -> LineEQ r
  • type NVLine2_ line r = (Line_ line 2 r, NonVerticalHyperPlane_ line 2 r)
  • class HasDirection t where
    • direction :: forall (d :: Nat) r. (Dimension t ~ d, NumType t ~ r) => Lens' t (Vector d r)
  • class HasSupportingLine t where
    • supportingLine :: t -> LinePV (Dimension t) (NumType t)
  • data LinePV (d :: Nat) r = LinePV {
    • _anchorPoint :: !(Point d r)
    • _direction :: !(Vector d r)
    }
  • class OnSideUpDownTest t where
    • onSideUpDown :: forall (d :: Nat) r point. (d ~ Dimension t, r ~ NumType t, Ord r, Num r, Point_ point d r) => point -> t -> SideTestUpDown
  • data SideTest
    • = LeftSide
    • | OnLine
    • | RightSide
  • data SideTestUpDown
    • = Below
    • | On
    • | Above
  • class (LineSegment_ lineSegment point, StartPointOf lineSegment ~ EndPoint 'Closed point, EndPointOf lineSegment ~ EndPoint 'Closed point) => ClosedLineSegment_ lineSegment point
  • class LineSegment_ lineSegment point => ConstructableLineSegment_ lineSegment point where
    • uncheckedLineSegment :: point -> point -> lineSegment
    • mkLineSegment :: point -> point -> Maybe lineSegment
  • class HasOnSegment lineSegment (d :: Nat) | lineSegment -> d where
    • onSegment :: (Ord r, Point_ point d r, r ~ NumType lineSegment, d ~ Dimension lineSegment) => point -> lineSegment -> Bool
  • class (IntervalLike_ lineSegment point, Point_ point (Dimension lineSegment) (NumType lineSegment)) => LineSegment_ lineSegment point | lineSegment -> point
  • class (LineSegment_ lineSegment point, StartPointOf lineSegment ~ EndPoint 'Open point, EndPointOf lineSegment ~ EndPoint 'Open point) => OpenLineSegment_ lineSegment point
  • type ClosedLineSegment point = LineSegment (EndPoint 'Closed) point
  • data LineSegment (endPoint :: Type -> Type) point where
    • pattern ClosedLineSegment :: point -> point -> ClosedLineSegment point
    • pattern LineSegment :: endPoint point -> endPoint point -> LineSegment endPoint point
    • pattern OpenLineSegment :: point -> point -> OpenLineSegment point
  • type OpenLineSegment point = LineSegment (EndPoint 'Open) point
  • data ClosedSegmentHalfSpaceIntersection extra point
    • = ClosedLineSegment_x_HalfSpace_Point point
    • | ClosedLineSegment_x_HalfSpace_SubSegment (ClosedLineSegment (OriginalOrExtra point extra))
    • | ClosedLineSegment_x_HalfSpace_CompleteSegment (ClosedLineSegment point)
  • data HalfLineLineSegmentIntersection point segment
    • = HalfLine_x_LineSegment_Point point
    • | HalfLine_x_LineSegment_LineSegment segment
  • data LineLineSegmentIntersection lineSegment
    • = Line_x_LineSegment_Point (Point 2 (NumType lineSegment))
    • | Line_x_LineSegment_LineSegment lineSegment
  • data LineSegmentLineSegmentIntersection lineSegment
    • = LineSegment_x_LineSegment_Point (Point 2 (NumType lineSegment))
    • | LineSegment_x_LineSegment_LineSegment lineSegment
  • data Triangle point where
    • pattern Triangle :: point -> point -> point -> Triangle point
  • type CanonicalPoint geom = Point (Dimension geom) (NumType geom)
  • type Point (d :: Nat) r = PointF (Vector d r)
  • class (Additive_ (Vector d r) d r, HasCoordinates point point, d ~ Dimension point, r ~ NumType point) => Affine_ point (d :: Nat) r | point -> d, point -> r where
    • (.-.) :: point -> point -> Vector d r
    • (.+^) :: point -> Vector d r -> point
    • (.-^) :: point -> Vector d r -> point
  • class Point_ point d r => ConstructablePoint_ point (d :: Nat) r where
    • fromVector :: Vector d r -> point
  • class (Has_ Vector_ (Dimension point) (NumType point), Has_ Vector_ (Dimension point') (NumType point'), HasComponents (Vector (Dimension point') (NumType point)) (Vector (Dimension point') (NumType point')), Dimension point ~ Dimension point', HasVector point point') => HasCoordinates point point' where
    • coordinates :: IndexedTraversal1 Int point point' (NumType point) (NumType point')
  • class HasPoints s t point point' | s -> point, t -> point' where
    • allPoints :: forall (d :: Nat) r r'. (Point_ point d r, Point_ point' d r', NumType s ~ r, NumType t ~ r', Dimension s ~ d, Dimension t ~ d) => Traversal1 s t point point'
  • type HasPoints' s point = HasPoints s s point point
  • class HasVector point point' where
    • vector :: forall (d :: Nat) r s. (Dimension point ~ d, NumType point ~ r, Dimension point' ~ d, NumType point' ~ s) => Lens point point' (Vector d r) (Vector d s)
  • class (Affine_ point d r, HasVector point point) => Point_ point (d :: Nat) r where
    • coord' :: Int -> IndexedTraversal' Int point r
  • class Metric_ (Vector (Dimension g) (NumType g)) (Dimension g) (NumType g) => HasSquaredEuclideanDistance g where
    • squaredEuclideanDistTo :: forall r (d :: Nat) point. (r ~ NumType g, d ~ Dimension g, Num r, Point_ point d r) => point -> g -> r
    • pointClosestTo :: forall r (d :: Nat) point. (r ~ NumType g, d ~ Dimension g, Num r, Point_ point d r) => point -> g -> Point d r
    • pointClosestToWithDistance :: forall r (d :: Nat) point. (r ~ NumType g, d ~ Dimension g, Num r, Point_ point d r) => point -> g -> (Point d r, r)
  • data CCW where
    • pattern CCW :: CCW
    • pattern CW :: CCW
    • pattern CoLinear :: CCW
  • newtype PointF v where
    • Point {
      • toVec :: v
      }
    • pattern Point1 :: r -> Point 1 r
    • pattern Point2 :: r -> r -> Point 2 r
    • pattern Point3 :: r -> r -> r -> Point 3 r
    • pattern Point4 :: r -> r -> r -> r -> Point 4 r
  • data Quadrant
    • = TopRight
    • | TopLeft
    • | BottomLeft
    • | BottomRight
  • class Vector_ vector d r => Additive_ vector (d :: Nat) r where
    • liftU2 :: (r -> r -> r) -> vector -> vector -> vector
    • liftI2A :: Apply f => (r -> r -> f r) -> vector -> vector -> f vector
  • class (r ~ IxValue vector, s ~ IxValue vector', d ~ Dimension vector, d ~ Dimension vector') => AsVector_ vector vector' (d :: Nat) r s | vector -> d, vector -> r, vector' -> s where
    • _Vector :: Iso vector vector' (Vector d r) (Vector d s)
  • type Has_ (c :: Type -> Nat -> Type -> k) (d :: Nat) r = c (Vector d r) d r
  • class Additive_ vector d r => Metric_ vector (d :: Nat) r where
    • dot :: vector -> vector -> r
    • quadrance :: vector -> r
    • qd :: vector -> vector -> r
    • norm :: vector -> r
    • signorm :: vector -> vector
  • class (HasComponents vector vector, AsVector_ vector vector d r r, KnownNat d) => Vector_ vector (d :: Nat) r where
    • generateA :: Applicative f => (Int -> f r) -> f vector
    • component' :: Int -> IndexedTraversal' Int vector r
  • class HasComponents vector vector' where
    • components :: IndexedTraversal1 Int vector vector' (IxValue vector) (IxValue vector')
  • data family Vector (d :: Nat) r
  • data Sign
    • = Negative
    • | Positive

Primitive Geometric Data Types

type BallByPoints point = BallByPoints' (1 + Dimension point) point #

data IntersectionOf (LinePV d r) (Ball point) # 
Instance details

Defined in HGeometry.Ball.CenterAndRadius

data IntersectionOf (LinePV d r) (Ball point)
  • = Line_x_Ball_Point (Point d r :+ r)
  • | Line_x_Ball_Segment (ClosedLineSegment (Point d r :+ r))

newtype Vector 1 r # 
Instance details

Defined in HGeometry.Vector.Type

newtype Vector 1 r = MkVector1 (V1 r)
newtype Vector 2 r # 
Instance details

Defined in HGeometry.Vector.Type

newtype Vector 2 r = MkVector2 (V2 r)
